I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

m + S n = S n + m

Proof:

Qed.```

Example 2:

Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let y_0 := cA_1 m zero y in let y_0_1 := cA_1 m one y_0 in let z := Iter (cF m) i y_0_1 in ~ expf m x_1 y -> betweenf m y_0_1 z y -> expf (L m zero x y) y_0_1 z

Premises:
inv_hmap = fix inv_hmap (m : fmap) : Prop := match m with | V => True | I m0 x _ _ => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_I m0 x | L m0 k0 x y => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_L m0 k0 x y end : fmap -> Prop
dart = nat : Set
betweenf = MF.between : fmap -> dart -> dart -> dart -> Prop
expf = fun (m : fmap) (x y : dart) => inv_hmap m /\ MF.expo m x y : fmap -> dart -> dart -> Prop
Iter = fix Iter (g : dart -> dart) (n : nat) (z : dart) {struct n} : dart := match n with | 0%nat => z | S n0 => g (Iter g n0 z) end : (dart -> dart) -> nat -> dart -> dart Argument scopes are [function_scope nat_scope _]
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat For S: Argument scope is [nat_scope]
cA_1 = fix cA (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x z then y else if eq_dart_dec (cA_1 m0 k y) z then cA m0 k x else cA m0 k z else cA m0 k z end with cA_1 (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m
Inductive fmap : Set := V : fmap | I : fmap -> dart -> tag -> point -> fmap | L : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> fmap
Inductive dim : Set := zero : dim | one : dim
cF = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) => cA_1 m one (cA_1 m zero z) : fmap -> dart -> dart
between_expf_L0_2 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> let y_0_1 := cF m y in let x0 := cA m zero x in let z := Iter (cF m) i y_0_1 in betweenf m y_0_1 z x0 -> expf (L m zero x y) y_0_1 z
between_expf_L0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y z t : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let y_0_1 := cF m y in let x0 := cA m zero x in betweenf m x_1 z y /\ betweenf m x_1 t y \/ betweenf m y_0_1 z x0 /\ betweenf m y_0_1 t x0 -> expf (L m zero x y) z t
between_expf_L0_3 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> let x0 := cA m zero x in let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let z := Iter (cF m) i x_1 in ~ expf m x_1 y -> betweenf m x_1 z x0 -> expf (L m zero x y) x_1 z
between_expf_L0_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let z := Iter (cF m) i x_1 in betweenf m x_1 z y -> expf (L m zero x y) x_1 z
expf_expf_L0_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> exd m z -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let t := Iter (cF m) i z in expf m x_1 y -> ~ expf m x_1 z -> expf (L m zero x y) z t
expf_expf_L0_3_bis : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> let x0 := cA m zero x in let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in ~ expf m x_1 y -> expf m x_1 z -> expf (L m zero x y) x_1 z
expf_L0_x0_y_0_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> let x0 := cA m zero x in let y_0_1 := cF m y in expf (L m zero x y) x0 y_0_1
cF_L0_2 : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> let y_0_1 := cF m y in let x0 := cA m zero x in betweenf m y_0_1 z x0 -> cF (L m zero x y) z = (if eq_dart_dec x0 z then y_0_1 else cF m z)
expf_L0_y_x_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in expf (L m zero x y) y x_1
cF_L0_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in betweenf m x_1 z y -> cF (L m zero x y) z = (if eq_dart_dec y z then x_1 else cF m z)
nf_L_B_aux : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let y := A m k x in let m0 := B m k x in let m1 := L m0 k x (A m k x) in nf m1 = match k with | zero => let x_1 := cA_1 m0 one x in nf m0 + (if expf_dec m0 x_1 y then 1 else -1) | one => let y0 := cA m0 zero y in nf m0 + (if expf_dec m0 x y0 then 1 else -1) end
Iter_cF_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart) (i : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let y := A m k x in Iter (cF (L (B m k x) k x (A m k x))) i z = Iter (cF m) i z
cA_1_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k j : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let y := A m k x in cA_1 (L (B m k x) k x y) j z = cA_1 m j z
F_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let y := A m k x in F (L (B m k x) k x y) z = F m z
exd_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let y := A m k x in exd (L (B m k x) k x y) z < -> exd m z
cF_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let y := A m k x in cF (L (B m k x) k x y) z = cF m z
MF.Iter_upb_period : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let nr := MF.Iter_upb m z in Iter (MF.f m) nr z = z
cF_L : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y z : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m k x y -> cF (L m k x y) z = (if eq_dim_dec k zero then cA_1 m one (if eq_dart_dec y z then x else if eq_dart_dec (cA m zero x) z then cA_1 m zero y else cA_1 m zero z) else if eq_dart_dec y (cA_1 m zero z) then x else if eq_dart_dec (cA m one x) (cA_1 m zero z) then cA_1 m one y else cA_1 m one (cA_1 m zero z))
cA_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k j : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let y := A m k x in cA (L (B m k x) k x y) j z = cA m j z
A_1_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k j : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let y := A m k x in A_1 (L (B m k x) k x y) j z = A_1 m j z
A_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k j : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let y := A m k x in A (L (B m k x) k x y) j z = A m j z
MF.unicity_mod_p : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (j k : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let p := MF.Iter_upb m z in (j < p)%nat -> (k < p)%nat -> Iter (MF.f m) j z = Iter (MF.f m) k z -> j = k
nf = fix nf (m : fmap) : Z := match m with | V => 0 | I m0 _ _ _ => nf m0 + 1 | L m0 zero x y => let x_1 := cA_1 m0 one x in nf m0 + (if expf_dec m0 x_1 y then 1 else -1) | L m0 one x y => let y0 := cA m0 zero y in nf m0 + (if expf_dec m0 x y0 then 1 else -1) end : fmap -> Z
planarity_criterion_RCP_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> planar m -> planar (L m one x y) -> ~ eqc m x y \/ expf m x (cA m zero y)
nc_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let m0 := B m k x in let m1 := L m0 k x (A m k x) in nc m1 = nc m

```coq
intros m x y i Hinv_hmap x_1 y_0 y_0_1 z Hexpf Hbetweenf.
rewrite <- (cF_L_B m zero x y_0 z Hinv_hmap) in Hbetweenf.
assert (Hexpf_m : expf m x_1 y_0_1) by auto.
assert (Hbetweenf_m : betweenf m x_1 z y_0_1) by auto.
apply between_expf_L0_2 with (x := x) (y := y) (i := i) in Hinv_hmap; auto.
Qed.```

original: intros m x y i Hinv_hmap x_1 y_0 y_0_1 z Hexpf Hbetweenf. rewrite <- (cF_L_B m zero x y_0 z Hinv_hmap) in Hbetweenf. assert (Hexpf_m : expf m x_1 y_0_1) by auto. assert (Hbetweenf_m : betweenf m x_1 z y_0_1) by auto. apply between_expf_L0_2 with (x := x) (y := y) (i := i) in Hinv_hmap; auto.
